content:
OK, write me a video script for: "Creating Stunning Art with Basic Techniques: How to Make the Most of Your Skills" 

I want this in a special outline format that we will refer to as [ FORMAT ]

The outline [ FORMAT ] is 

- A HOOK cold open
- Open Splash front bumper with music and logo (5 seconds)
- Short Introduction
- Teaser - open with an open loop about what they will learn
- Main Content
- Question (like what did you like best in this video) CTA to like, comment, and subscribe. 
- Deliver the teaser content 
- FINAL CTA - to get the user to go to my website to subscribe to my art newsletter
- Now, watch this video next (we will recommend a video on another topic about Art)
